benchmark_details.name: RETQA (Real Estate Tabular Question Answering)
benchmark_details.overview: RETQA is the first large-scale open-domain Chinese Tabular Question Answering dataset for the Real Estate sector, comprising 4,932 tables and 20,762 question-answer pairs across three major domains: property information, real estate company finance, and land auction information.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a challenging resource for TQA research, particularly in handling open-domain, long tables and multi-domain queries.

data.source: Publicly available real estate data from major Chinese cities, including property transaction data, company financial disclosures, and land auction information.
data.annotation: Automatically generated QA pairs using template-based approaches with human review and inclusion of Spoken Language Understanding (SLU) labels.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model outputs against the ground truth data and evaluated using precision and recall based methods.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better model performance in answering questions related to tabular data.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance comparison with baseline LLMs demonstrates significant improvements with the SLUTQA framework.
methodology.validation: Validation conducted through extensive experimental results showing the effectiveness of methods.
